<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Halfling Weapon Familiarity](/Feats.aspx?ID=55) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Halfling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=87" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 52 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You favor traditional halfling weapons, so you've learned how to use them more effectively. You have the trained proficiency with the [frying pan](/Weapons.aspx?ID=286), [sling](/Weapons.aspx?ID=72), [halfling sling staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=78), and [shortsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=43). You gain access to all uncommon [halfling](/Traits.aspx?ID=87) weapons. For the purpose of determining your proficiency, martial halfling weapons are simple weapons and advanced halfling weapons are martial weapons.

<title level="2">Halfling Weapon Familiarity leads to...</title>
[Halfling Weapon Expertise](/Feats.aspx?ID=65), [Halfling Weapon Trickster](/Feats.aspx?ID=61)
name: Halfling Weapon Familiarity
